verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) O Clap <WH8628> your hands, <WH3709> all <WH3605> peoples; <WH5971> Shout <WH7321> to God <WH430> with the voice <WH6963> of joy. <WH7440>
For the Lord <WH3068> Most <WH9411> High <WH9411> is to be feared, <WH3372> A great <WH1419> King <WH4428> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
He subdues <WH1696> peoples <WH5971> under <WH8478> us, And nations <WH3816> under <WH8478> our feet. <WH7272>
He chooses <WH977> our inheritance <WH5159> for us, The glory <WH1347> of Jacob <WH3290> whom <WH834> He loves. <WH157> Selah. <WH5542>
God <WH430> has ascended <WH5927> with a shout, <WH8643> The Lord, <WH3068> with the sound <WH6963> of a trumpet. <WH7782>
Sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to God, <WH430> sing <WH2167> praises; <WH2167> Sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to our King, <WH4428> sing <WH2167> praises. <WH2167>
For God <WH430> is the King <WH4428> of all <WH3605> the earth; <WH776> Sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> with a skillful <WH4905> psalm. <WH4905>
God <WH430> reigns <WH4427> over <WH5921> the nations, <WH1471> God <WH430> sits <WH3427> on His holy <WH6944> throne. <WH3678>

The princes <WH5081> of the people <WH5971> have assembled <WH622> themselves [as] the people <WH5971> of the God <WH430> of Abraham; <WH85> For the shields <WH4043> of the earth <WH776> belong to God; <WH430> He is highly <WH3966> exalted. <WH5927>
